text: "Sentimental Lady" is a 1972 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac. It was originally recorded for their sixth studio album Bare Trees and was re- recorded by Bob Welch in 1977 for his studio album French Kiss. It went to number 8 in the United States and number 3 in Canada. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Sentimental Lady
